title: Spotify Mock up FE
text: Spotify Challenge-: Spotify Mock-up app where you can listen,search for songs / artist/ albums / artist page. Made in React using deezer API.
note: NB: Please be aware that rendering can take a while since it was deployed on free hosting for showing purposes.

title: Ideal Place to Work FE
text: Capstone Team Project-: Ideal place to work  is a project where you can search for a cafe, coworking space, etc for working purposes. You can rate a place and filter places by fields like Google Service, Strong WiFi, etc. Made in React using Google API.
note: NB: Please be aware that rendering can take a while since it was deployed on free hosting for showing purposes.

title: LinkedIn Mock-up FE
text: linkedIn Team Project-: LinkedIn Mock-up app where you can login / register & create your profile, add a post, chat with other users, react on other user's posts, etc. Made in React using the API made by the Team.
note: NB: Please be aware that rendering can take a while since it was deployed on free hosting for showing purposes.

title: COVID19 Dash Board FE
text: COVID19 DASHBOARD-: A simple dashboard with the map and graph. Made in React using different APIs to get the world info and exported .json file from the public repo of Dept. of Civil Protection Italy to get the regions and provinces.
note: NB: Please be aware that rendering can take a while since it was deployed on free hosting for showing purposes.
